name: Mädn
description:
This is a fun implementation of the popular german game "Mensch ärgere dich nicht" (Man, don't get angry). I did this because I think this game is not really a game as you do not have any real influence on the outcome.

Just for fun I also added a board creator so you can make your custom board. This board creator supports custom teams, colors and placing spots in all three dimensions.
